name: Lonely Hero & Non-Fight Party
storyline: A lone hero appointed by the king tries to recruit a party and save the world. There's just one problem... they're all lazy bums addicted to gambling. Can our lonely hero save the world by himself?
summary:
A lone hero tries to recruit a party and save the world. There's just one problem... they're all lazy bums addicted to gambling. Can our lonely hero save the world by himself?

Part idle clicker, part casino mini-games. Fight monsters with the Hero while earning gold gambling at the casino with his slacker party to afford new equipment.
